text:
So in the past few
years, Telecom has made an important stride

on its path towards
becoming a 100% digital company

and continue to strengthen
its strategy of accelerating and scaling

the digital transformation
on its core business and new initiatives.

For this transformation, Telecom requires
the renewal of the company's core

platforms focus on
creating an omnichannel experience

and the transformation of the back office
in all areas.

We are looking forward to evolve
into a lifetime strategy with our services

and solution, not only in Argentina,
Paraguay, Uraguay, and Chile,

where we already have a foothold,
but also in all Latin America

through cyber security, cloud,
fintech, and entertainment platforms.

One of the pillars of our digital
transformation is the deployment

of our hybrid multi-cloud strategy,
which allow us to efficiently integrate

the on-premise infrastructure
of our data centers with the public

cloud of the most relevant partners
in the market.

Cloud strategy is an enabling platform
for both our core business
and new digital business.

Flow is a Telecom streaming
media platform.

Born as a 100% digital product, it works
as a meeting point for all entertainment.

Flow is unique entertainment platform
with live and on-demand content,

fictions, co-productions, music, gaming,
and others.

One of the pillars of our digital
transformation is the deployment

of our hybrid multi-cloud strategy,
which allow us to integrate an On-Prem

infrastructure with the public cloud of
the most relevant partners on the market.

We have also a mature team
of professionals that use AWS

as technology partner for several
of these functions and components.
Flow uses several accounts in advance

of multi-account model with a strong focus
on shared security services.

To run the demanding Flow apps
and backend at scale,

our team has a clear understanding
of the difference between AWS compute

platforms and use AKS, ACS, or Lambda,
depending on the solution characteristics.

Also, it allows us
to put more focus on innovation

because we can develop new technologies
and solutions in a better way.
